title: WING
text: South Park Elementary, day. Class is in session. The kids are chattering when Mrs. Garrison gets their attention

title: WING
text: Children, children, we have a very special announcement.  Your classmate, Token, has just returned from winning the Colorado Child Star Contest with his incredible singing! Well let's give him a hand!

title: WING
text: Token sings?

title: WING
text: Of course he sings. He's black.

title: WING
text: Token is going to sing in front of a huge audience at the Miss Colorado Pageant in Denver. And for doing it he's gonna be paid two hundred dollars.

title: WING
text: Whoa!

title: WING
text: Two hundred dollars.

title: WING
text: Now of course, as a woman, I'm a bit against those chauvinistic pageants, but I hope that you children take a moment today to congratulate Token for being so special.

title: WING
text: South Park Elementary, lunchtime. Stan and friends sit at a table just outside the school kitchen. They're deep in thought

title: WING
text: Wow, two hundred dollars. Can you imagine?

title: WING
text: How come we never get opportunities like that?

title: WING
text: You wanna know what it is, guys?

title: WING
text: We're not talented?

title: WING
text: That's right. We're not talented. See, we're not the artistic side, we're the thinking side.

title: WING
text: Yeah. We're too smart to be talented.

title: WING
text: Wait, you guys! I just had an amazing idea. Token is going right to the top, right. I mean, he's gonna be a huge star.

title: WING
text: Probably.

title: WING
text: So, why shouldn't we get some of that money? We can be Token's agents. That way, we get ten percent of whatever he makes!

title: WING
text: Hey yeah! We deserve that money just as much as he does.

title: WING
text: We just need a really kickass office and some nice suits. A and a fountain in our lobby. All top agencies have fountains in their lobbies. We gotta make Token think he needs us, when actually he doesn't need us at all.

title: WING
text: MONTAGE Cartman tries out his suit in front of a full-length mirror in his room. Stan and Kyle try out suits in Kyle's room. Next, the boys are in a department store purchasing cell phones at Bull's Eye. Next, Stan and Kyle carry an executive desk into the new office. Next, Cartman and Kenny steal a fountain from somebody's backyard. Next, flyers for the new agency, Super Awesome Talent Agency, are printed out. Next, the boys are at a copy center to get some business cards. Next, Cartman and Kyle set up signs around town. Next, the finished office is shown... in Cartman's basement. The four boys congratulate each other for a job well donw.

title: WING
text: South Park, day. Token walks by one of the signs the boys drew up. He notices it and stops to read it. The boys hide around the corner. Stan peaks around the corner.

title: WING
text: He's looking at the sign.

title: WING
text: Perfect! All right, you guys get back to the office, I'll bring Token there.

title: WING
text: All right.

title: WING
text: Wait a minute! You guys, this is very important: when I bring Token back to the office, have Kenny hide in another room, and call the phone on my desk.

title: WING
text: Why?

title: WING
text: Because I'll answer and pretend I'm talking to somebody super famous and important. When Token sees that, maybe he'll think we're legit.

title: WING
text: It's genius.

title: WING
text: Okay, go go, here he comes.  Yeah? Well then tell him we're just not interested. Oh hey, Token! Buddy, my man, what is up?!

title: WING
text: Nothin'

title: WING
text: Hey, you know, I heard you were doing some thing down in Denver tomorrow night.

title: WING
text: Yeah.

title: WING
text: Yeah I don't know if I ever told you this before, but I'm actually an agent over at the Super Awesome Talent Agency. You may have seen our ads around town. Anyway, why don't you come down to the office, Token? Maybe I can convince the company to represent you.

title: WING
text: I'm supposed to be home by 3:30.

title: WING
text: This will only take a second.

title: WING
text: Cartman's basement - er, Super Awesome Talent Agency. Cartman takes Token down the stairs and onto the agency floor

title: WING
text: Welcome to our offices, Token. As you can see, we are quite a successful company. Did you notice the fountain? Pretty nice, hm?  Come on over this way, Token. Guys, you remember Token. He's thinking about becoming a client.

title: WING
text: Oohhhh Token. Right, yeah, you're makin' a smart move, man.

title: WING
text: Now, Token, I I know what you're saying to yourself: You're saying, "Hey, why do I need an agency? Why should I give them ten percent?" Right?

title: WING
text: ...Yeah?

title: WING
text: Token, the truth is that without representation, you in danger of being taken advantage of.  Uh uh, excuse me just a second, Token.  Super Awesome Talent Agency. Oh yes, hello! How are you, Abraham Lincoln?  Yeahh, yeah, no, I'm happy you called, Abraham Lincoln. I'm just sort of in the middle of something right now.

title: WING
text: Can I talk to you?!

title: WING
text: I'll I'll call you back, Abe.

title: WING
text: What the hell are you doing?!

title: WING
text: I'm making it look like important people call us.

title: WING
text: Abraham Lincoln has been dead for two hundred years!

title: WING
text: ...well Token doesn't know that.

title: WING
text: Yes he does!

title: WING
text: How?!

title: WING
text: Token actually pays attention in school! Unlike you, fatass!

title: WING
text: Jew!

title: WING
text: You guys, we're gonna lose our client.

title: WING
text: Yes, yes, I think that's a good idea, guys. Let's give Michael Jordan a call about that.  Ah, now, where were we?

title: WING
text: We were at why I should give you ten percent.

title: WING
text: Look, Token, here's the bottom line. You're gonna start having a lot of offers comin' at you from all directions. A media storm is about to hit you and you can't handle it on your own. Nobody can.

title: WING
text: Eminem, Justin Timberlake, Hootie... They all have agents. You need somebody to manage it all for you.

title: WING
text: This thing in Denver is is just the crust, Token. With our support, you can have the whole pie.

title: WING
text: Well, I guess that makes sense. All right.

title: WING
text: Uh if... we could just get you to sign right here?

title: WING
text: Welcome to the team, Token.

title: WING
text: Ah Kenny, Token just signed with us!

title: WING
text: (Hey, terrific!)

title: WING
text: From now on, we are an entertainment team, Token. You just do all the singing, all the performing and all the entertaining,and leave the rest to us.

title: WING
text: Denver Convention Center, night. The Miss Colorado Pageant is underway

title: WING
text: And there are your finalists, the sixteen most beautiful women in Colorado. Here to sing for our sixteen lucky finalists, the winner of the Colorado Child Star Contest, Token Black.

title: WING
text: You'll never find...

title: WING
text: Wow, he's really great. We should get him to sing at Tommy's bar mitzvah

title: WING
text: Oh, you're interested in hiring our client?

title: WING
text: We represent Token.  Give us a call, we'll work out a deal.

title: WING
text: Whoa, I'm not braggin' on myself, baby

title: WING
role: But I'm the one who loves you

title: WING
role: And there's no one else! No-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh one else.

title: WING
text: Just between us girls, nothin' gets my vadge wetter than a black man singing.

title: WING
text: Mr. Garrison, for the love of God.

title: WING
text: ... (you're gonna miss my lovin')

title: WING
role: I know you're gonna my lovin' (you're gonna miss my lovin')

title: WING
role: You're gonna miss, you're gonna miss my lo-o-ove.

title: WING
text: Denver Convention Center, after the show, outside. The boys walk out with Token, who's counting the cash he earned.

title: WING
text: You were awesome, Token!

title: WING
text: We knew you could do it!

title: WING
text: Two hundred dollars, Token, that's great! And ten percent of two hundred is...

title: WING
text: Twenty dollars.

title: WING
text: Here you go.

title: WING
text: (All right!)

title: WING
text: Sweet!

title: WING
text: This is just the beginning. I bet we start to see all kinds of offers comin' in for Token now.

title: WING
text: Hey there my man, that was a great performance.

title: WING
text: Thanks.

title: WING
text: Don Heisman, Creative Arts Agency in Los Angeles. I think you've got real promise. How'd you like to sign with CAA?

title: WING
text: Are you serious??

title: WING
text: Uh excuse me, Token already has representation.

title: WING
text: You may have heard of Super Awesome Talent Agency.

title: WING
text: Mm, no. Uh, look, Token, there's some shows in LA we wanna book you on right away. If you come out to my limo we can talk everything through.

title: WING
text: Oh my God! Okay!

title: WING
text: Token, you signed with us!

title: WING
text: Oh, come on, guys. You have to see what a huge opportunity this is for me.

title: WING
text: What?! Uh they're not so great! They probably don't have a fountain in their lobby!

title: WING
text: Actually, our fountain is two stories tall.

title: WING
text: ...Oooo...

title: WING
text: Come on, Token, we have a lot to talk about.

title: WING
text: Mister, you can't do this to us!

title: WING
text: Sorry kids, nature of the business, you know?  Do you like steak, Token? I know a great place for you locally.

title: WING
text: ...Goddamnit!

title: WING
text: Super Awesome Talent Agency, day. The boys sit around a table trying to come up with other ways of attracting potential clients. Kenny relaxes on the sofa

title: WING
text: So unfair... so unfair.

title: WING
text: All that time and effort we spent helping Token and this is the thanks we get?!

title: WING
text: This just goes to show that hard work doesn't pay off! I'm gonna be a homeless addict from now on!

title: WING
text: Ahh hello, is this the Talent Agency

title: WING
text: Huh?

title: WING
text: I see this sign on the street for a talent agency? I need a representation. Hey, wowee, nice fountain.

title: WING
text: You were looking for a talent agent?

title: WING
text: No, not me, my wife.  This is Wing. She just come over from China.  She over here uh irregarry. The Chinese Mafia help me out.

title: WING
text: And what does she do?

title: WING
text: Ah, she sing. She very popular in China. Hey, you just sit and listen. You'll be very impressed.  Well? What you think?

title: WING
text: Uh, we're sorry dude, but getting her career off the ground would take too much work for us.

title: WING
text: Aww, that's too bad. She just got accepted to be on American Idol in Ros Angeres, but I can't take her 'cause I have to mind the restaurant.

title: WING
text: You've ...already done all the work?

title: WING
text: Yes. They say it pays a thousand dowrar.

title: WING
text: Sir, we would love to sign your wife.

title: WING
text: Yeah!

title: WING
text: Rearry?

title: WING
text: We'll go to LA with your wife. All she has to do is go on the show, do all the performing, make all the money, and leave the rest to us.

title: WING
text: City Wok, night. The phone rings.

title: WING
text: Shitty Wok, take your order prease.

title: WING
text: City Wok, night. The phone rings.

title: WING
text: Hi, Mr. Lu Kim? Uh hi, it's Wing's agents. Everything's fine, yeah, but we're supposed to arrive in Los Angeles in about four hours. Listen, does your wife ever eat? Or anything?

title: WING
text: Oh, don't worry about her. She a very dericate little flower. See, she don't need to eat much.

title: WING
text: Uhh, all right. We'll call you after she goes on TV.

title: WING
text: Okay, bye. Oh oh wait! Can I talk to my wife, please?

title: WING
text: Uh sure, here she is.  Okay, finarry everything rookin' up for me and my family.  Welcome to Shitty Wok, take your order prease?  Aw crap, Chinese Mafia!  Aaaaahh!

title: WING
text: Mr. Ru Kim, it appears we have a problem.

title: WING
text: Oh, a problem? Rearry?

title: WING
text: We smuggled your wife into the United States for you. You were to pay us ten thousand dollars for that service. Yet, we have yet to be paid.

title: WING
text: We... we working on it! She, she got tarent agent! She's about to make a whole lotta money!

title: WING
text: It's too late for that, Mr. Kim. Your wife is now our property. We're taking her to Los Angeles, where she will work in massage parlor.until she works off the debt.

title: WING
text: No, she... she not here! Prease, just give me a little more time!  Agh!

title: WING
text: Where is she?!

title: WING
text: She... she in Arabama.

title: WING
text: You're lying. Turn him around!

title: WING
text: Yah, wah, aaaah!

title: WING
text: You don't wanna tell us where she is? All right. Puh la! Ching ga wai pan!

title: WING
text: Ahhh! My shitty chicken!  Nooo, the shitty beef!  No! No wait! Prease! Stop! Prease! Not the shitty shrimp.

title: WING
text: Tell us where to find her, Ru Kim! You have no choice.

title: WING
text: She... she go to Ros Angeres with her agents! She gonna be on American Idol.

title: WING
text: Hollywood, day. A view of the Hollywood sign from a location above a main thoroughfare

title: WING
text: A major studio. The boys walk among the various studios - Studio 21, Studio 22, Studio 23...

title: WING
text: There it is! American Idol constestants!

title: WING
text: Jesus, we made it just in time!

title: WING
text: Excuse us!

title: WING
text: Hey kid, what do you think you're doing?

title: WING
text: Ah our client has an audition to this show.

title: WING
text: Yeah. So do we!

title: WING
text: Oh crap!

title: WING
text: Dude, how long is the wait?

title: WING
text: It's been about seventeen days for me.

title: WING
text: Oh no, nonono, come on!  Excuse me, ma'am.

title: WING
text: Wait in line with everyone else.

title: WING
text: No, I don't think you understand. We're here with Wing. That's right, the Wing.

title: WING
text: Ma'am, we are a very important talent agency. If your producers knew you were forcing people of our stature to the back of the line, well-

title: WING
text: Brrr brrr! Brrr brrr! Oh, excuse me, everyone. That's my cell phone.  Hello? Oh yes, hi, Colonel Sanders! Yes, I'm doing great, but you know, heh, someone at American Idol doesn't know who Wing is.

title: WING
text: Aw, just forget it!

title: WING
text: Eh eh, you're right, Colonel Sanders! You shouldn't give her any more chicken.

title: WING
text: Goddamnit! Goddamnit!

title: WING
text: We can't wait in line! We have to be in school on Monday!

title: WING
text: Stupid assholes!

title: WING
text: What do you mean your client isn't coming?! We're taping the show tomorrow! Where am I goin' to find another contestant? Fine! Go screw yourself!

title: WING
text: Ahh-d, excuse me, sir, did I hear you say you needed somebody for your show?

title: WING
text: We have someone who's ready to go on TV right away!

title: WING
text: Really?

title: WING
text: Is there a cash prize involved in your show as well?

title: WING
text: Well yeah, winner gets a thousand dollars.

title: WING
text: All right, our client will do it!

title: WING
text: Great! You kids just saved my ass! See you over at Stage 6.

title: WING
text: Hey, is your show as good as America Idol?

title: WING
text: Naw, this is better. It's called The Contender.

title: WING
text: What's "The Contender"?

title: WING
text: The Contender commercial

title: WING
text: Tonight, two people will compete for glory. One will stay, one will go home, in the new hit show by Sylvester Stallone.

title: WING
text: Hello.

title: WING
text: The Contender!

title: WING
text: The Contender taping

title: WING
text: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to The Contender! Fighting out of the red corner, wearing blue and white trunks, the Destructor from Del Fuego, Mexico, Manuelo Furrrrnanda!

title: WING
text: Le's go! Le's see a good fight!

title: WING
text: And fighting out of the blue corner, wearing a gorgeous floral-pattern silk dress, Wing!

title: WING
text: Come on, Wing!

title: WING
text: Let's do it Wing!

title: WING
text: Brint it on Wing!

title: WING
text: Aw yeah!

title: WING
text: Awww!

title: WING
text: Oh my God, dude!

title: WING
text: She's got a hell of a chin on her, I'll give her that.

title: WING
text: Awww!

title: WING
text: Gay.

title: WING
text: Stage 6, day. The boys stand outside the stage with cups in their hands

title: WING
text: Anyone? Help four boys and a Chinese woman get back to Colorado?

title: WING
text: Your gift of hope is a great deduction.

title: WING
text: Hey kid!

title: WING
text: Mr. Stallone says he's sorry it couldn't go better for you back there.

title: WING
text: Oh, thanks.

title: WING
text: Yo kid.

title: WING
text: Mr. Stallone thinks your singer has a lot of talent.  He really likes her voice.  You know, the way she vocalizes the melody,  it brings tears to his eyes.

title: WING
text: Thanks, Mr. Stallone. We're just sorry she wasn't a better boxer.

title: WING
text: Uh, Mr. Stallone wants Wing to sing at his son's wedding.

title: WING
text: You do??

title: WING
text: He'll pay her four thousand dollars.

title: WING
text: Four thousand dollars??

title: WING
text: Be at this address tomorrow 2 p.m. sharp. And don't be late.

title: WING
text: We won't!

title: WING
text: Waaaaah!

title: WING
text: You guys, you guys!

title: WING
text: What?

title: WING
text: Sylverster Stallone wants Wing to sing at his son's wedding tomorrow! He's gonna pay her four thousand dollars!

title: WING
text: (What?!)

title: WING
text: Get out!

title: WING
text: That's four hundred for us! We did it!

title: WING
text: Woohoo! Yeah!

title: WING
text: Yeah!

title: WING
text: Who let the dogs out?

title: WING
text: Who? Who? Who who?

title: WING
text: Who let the dogs out?

title: WING
text: Who? Who? Who who?

title: WING
text: Who let-?

title: WING
text: Whoa whoa, wait, wait. ...where's Wing?

title: WING
text: What do you mean? We thought she was with you.

title: WING
text: Naw, sh-she was with you!

title: WING
text: ...Oh Jesus Christ. If that big CAA talent agency finds out she has work, they're gonna try to steal her away from us again.

title: WING
text: Wing? Wing??

title: WING
text: Wing?

title: WING
text: Wing? Here, Wing!

title: WING
text: Wing?

title: WING
text: (Wing?)

title: WING
text: You thought you could run from us, did you?

title: WING
text: Oh no!  Hey! That's our client!

title: WING
text: They did it to us again! That dirty talent agency stole our client again!

title: WING
text: Not this time! They dropped their card. Now we know where CAA Talent Agency is! We're gonna march in there, and get our client back.

title: WING
text: A crisp clear night under a bright moon. The camera pans down and rests on a hilltop mansion

title: WING
text: You see, Mrs. Kim, when you made a deal with us, you signed your life away. Yes, we help Chinese citizens sneak into the U.S., but when they get here, they become our slaves. It's an age-old business, and nobody has the guts to stop us.

title: WING
text: Two four nine all right, this is the place.

title: WING
text: Damn, CAA is pretty impressive.

title: WING
text: Of course it's impressive! They steal everyone else's clients!

title: WING
text: "It's just four little boys"

title: WING
text: Yeah, whatever. You can suck our balls.

title: WING
text: The mansion, inside. The boys walk through a long, lavish hallway

title: WING
text: Hello? We want to talk to somebody right now!

title: WING
text: Oh my God, you guys. Look!  They do have an amazing fountain.

title: WING
text: You assholes stole our client! How about some Goddamn business ethics?!

title: WING
text: You tell 'em, Kyle!

title: WING
text: You think you own the entertainment business, but you don't! Give us back Wing, RIGHT NOW!

title: WING
text: Jesus, they really want Wing as their client!

title: WING
text: What the hell is that?! Go! Go!

title: WING
text: Dude, maybe we should give up!

title: WING
text: No! Screw that, dude! If we keep letting CAA take all our clients, we're never gonna make it as talent agents!

title: WING
text: Yeah, if these talent agents wanna play rouch, we can play rought too!

title: WING
text: Cartman!

title: WING
text: Do you wanna play rough?! Okay!  Take this!

title: WING
text: We've gotta split up and find Wing! You and Kenny go that way!

title: WING
text: Wing??

title: WING
text: Two guards fire away. Kyle and Kenny duck and cover themselves, and two guards coming up behind them are killed. Cartman and Stan go down a hallway, with Cartman firing at everything in sight. Two guards follow them and fire away. Kyle finds shelter behind a red sofa tattered from the gunfire, but Kenny isn't with him

title: WING
text: Stupid talent agents!

title: WING
text: Kyle looks up from behind the sofa and throws the car towards the gunmen. One of them slips on it and flies out a window, the other slips on it and falls back onto the mansion's fuse box. He gets electrocuted

title: WING
text: All right, Kenny, let's go!  Kenny? Kenny!  Don't worry, Kenny. You didn't die for nothing.  We're gonna get Wing back as our client and... and make a ton of money! I swear it to you!

title: WING
text: Kyle hugs Kenny again. Cartman and Stan enter the room where Wing is being held. Cartman again opens fire and three guards fire back. Kyle enters the room with his own gun and fires at the guards

title: WING
text: They killed Kenny!

title: WING
text: You bastards!

title: WING
text: Enough!  I have a lot of respect for you boys finding your way in here. But you come any closer and I'll blow her brains out.

title: WING
text: Don't give us that crap! She's no good to you dead and you know it!

title: WING
text: Yeah, you wouldn't kill her, 'cause then she can't pay you money! We know because we're in the same business you are!

title: WING
text: This woman has a contract with us! We own her!

title: WING
text: She had a contract with us first! We own her!

title: WING
text: Her life belongs to us!

title: WING
text: Her life belongs to us!

title: WING
text: Guys! Guys! Guys! Don't you see what we're doing? Jesus... we're not talking about an object here, we're, we're talking about a person. I mean, look at what we've all become. All this violence and anger and, and for what? For control over somebody's life who... w-we're all just trying to leech off of.

title: WING
text: Yeah.

title: WING
text: Wing doesn't belong to us or to you. We're all just caught up in a business that treats people like commodities.

title: WING
text: Perhaps... you're right. We spend all this time... mooching off the hopes and dreams of others, forgetting that they are human beings.

title: WING
text: Yeah. It's not a very satisfying feeling.

title: WING
text: I am tired of this business. It is a very dirty and perverse business.

title: WING
text: It's a lousy business. I quit.

title: WING
text: Me too.

title: WING
text: Aw aw guys, come on!

title: WING
text: We quit too.  It's time for us to find another way to make money. From now on, all contracts we have on people are null and void.

title: WING
text: All right!

title: WING
text: Stallone's mansion, next day. He gets on stage to ...um, mumble

title: WING
text: Mr. Stallone thanks all of you for coming to his son's wedding. And now as a special treat, it is his pleasure to give you the music of... Wing!

title: WING
text: Sing, sing a song, make it simple, to last your whole life long...

title: WING
text: Boys, thank you so much for eveything. You rearry helped us out.

title: WING
text: Yes, you were right, kids. Her voice is so beautiful.  To think we would have made it so nobody would ever hear her sing.

title: WING
text: I think we all learned it's best to leave talent to the talented people.

title: WING
text: Send a cress in your plates, folks?

title: WING
text: Token?

title: WING
text: Oh... Hey guys.  What, what are you doin' here?

title: WING
text: Token, you're... waiting tables?

title: WING
text: Yeah. Well, it turns out an agency doesn't really do anything for you.  I'm trying to work my way back home.

title: WING
text: Aw man, that's too bad, Token. Hey, could you bring us some more bread, huh? Oh and some more olive oil. Chop chop!

title: WING
text: My God, her voice is sooo beautiful!

title: WING
text: Yeah, she's a very dericate rittle flower.

title: WING
text: Sing, sing a song.
